{
    "number": 191137,
    "data": "1,4,6,13,18,19,26,40,54,55,58,74,78,79,106,121,162,163,166,175,218,222,223,234,235,238,298,314,318,319,364,426,486,487,490,499,526,650,654,655,666,667,670,702,703,706,715,874,890,894,895,938,942,943,954,955,958,1093,1194,1258,1274,1278,1279,1458,1459,1462,1471",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 3x+1 and 4x+2 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A191113."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A191137/b191137.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 3; i = 1; j = 4; k = 2; f = 1; g = 9;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]   (* A191137 *)",
        "b = (a - 1)/3; c = (a - 2)/4; r = Range[1, 1500];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A191198 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A191199 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a191137 n = a191137_list !! (n-1)",
        "a191137_list = f $ singleton 1",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (3*m+1) $ insert (4*m+2) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A191113."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2011",
    "references": 4,
    "revision": 8,
    "time": "2013-07-13T12:04:10-04:00",
    "created": "2011-05-28T15:18:50-04:00"
